string.name: dashboard_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Dashboard' screen where the user can see an overview of everything.

string.name: statistics_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Statistics' screen where the user can see an overview of the statistics.

string.name: settings_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Settings' screen where the user can change settings.

string.name: settings_calendar_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Calendar settings' screen where the user can change calendar settings.

string.name: accounting_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Accounting' screen where the user can see an overview of the accounting.

string.name: catalog_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Catalog' screen where the user can see an overview of the catalog.

string.name: client_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Client' screen where the user can see an overview of the clients.

string.name: client_detail_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Client' screen where the user can see the detail of a client.

string.name: client_add_edit_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Client' screen where the user can add or edit a client.

string.name: horse_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Horse' screen where the user can see an overview of the horses.

string.name: horse_detail_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Horse' screen where the user can see the detail of a horse.

string.name: horse_add_edit_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Horse' screen where the user can add or edit a horse.

string.name: stable_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Stable' screen where the user can see an overview of the stables.

string.name: stable_detail_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Stable' screen where the user can see the detail of a stable.

string.name: stable_add_edit_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Stable' screen where the user can add or edit a stable.

string.name: breed_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Breed' screen where the user can see an overview of the breeds.

string.name: breed_detail_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Breed' screen where the user can see the detail of a breed.

string.name: breed_add_edit_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Breed' screen where the user can add or edit a breed.

string.name: navigation_drawer_header_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the image that is shown at the top of the navigation drawer.

string.name: dashboard_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'Dashboard' screen when empty

string.name: breed_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the breed detail screen.

string.name: a11y_dashboard_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the dashboard images shown in the 'Dashboard' screen.

string.name: a11y_horse_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the horse images shown in the 'Horse' screen.

string.name: a11y_settings_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the settings images shown in the 'Settings' screen.

string.name: added_horse
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds a horse.

string.name: share_text_breed
string.translation_description: The default messaged used when sharing a plant on SNS, etc.

resources.string: Check out the %s plant in the Android Sunflower app
Full permission to the calendar is required for this app to read and write events.
